poem:
**Skyward Connection**

above cloud's crest,  
signals dance,  
freewinged whispers  
on Musk's mirrored birds—  
economy to first,  
bridging gaps unseen,  
wondrous stream  
through the threaded vast;  
airborne,  
souls knit closer  
on the high-altitude loom—  
intimacy  
in the speed of light.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "British Airways to offer free fast onboard wifi to all after Starlink deal Passengers on British Airways flights will be able to access fast wifi onboard at no cost after the airline’s parent company signed a deal with Elon Musk’s satellite company. The carrier said the free “reliable and lightning-fast” wifi from Starlink would be available to customers flying in economy, business or first class from next month. BA’s owner, International Airlines Group (IAG), said". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: British Airways to offer free fast onboard wifi to all after Starlink deal Passengers on British Airways flights will be able to access fast wifi onboard at no cost after the airline’s parent company signed a deal with Elon Musk’s satellite company. The carrier said the free “reliable and lightning-fast” wifi from Starlink would be available to customers flying in economy, business or first class from next month. BA’s owner, International Airlines Group (IAG), said
